hero.title: Our Premium Services
hero.subtitle: Experience luxury and convenience with our comprehensive airport services

descriptions.lounges: Comfortable waiting areas with premium amenities
descriptions.vip: Exclusive airport experience with dedicated service
descriptions.transfer: Reliable airport transfers to your destination
descriptions.chauffeur: Luxury vehicle service with professional drivers
descriptions.fast_track: Expedited passage through security and immigration
descriptions.priority_checkin: Skip the lines with dedicated check-in service
descriptions.airport_lounge: Relax in exclusive lounges before your flight

fast_track.title: Fast Track Service
fast_track.subtitle: Skip the lines and save time
fast_track.intro: Our Fast Track service provides expedited passage through security and immigration checkpoints, allowing you to save valuable time and avoid long queues.

standard.title: Standard Fast Track
standard.description: Expedited passage through regular security and immigration lanes

premium.title: Premium Fast Track
premium.description: Priority access through dedicated fast track lanes with personal escort

family.title: Family Fast Track
family.description: Expedited service for families with children, including assistance with strollers and baby equipment

how_it_works.title: How Fast Track Works
steps: Book your Fast Track service online
Meet our representative at the designated meeting point
Our staff will escort you to the dedicated fast track lanes
Bypass the regular queues at security and immigration
Save time and continue to your gate or lounge

priority_checkin.title: Priority Check-in Service
priority_checkin.subtitle: Start your journey with ease
priority_checkin.intro: Our Priority Check-in service offers dedicated counters and expedited processing, allowing you to check in for your flight quickly and efficiently.

standard.title: Standard Priority Check-in
standard.description: Access to dedicated check-in counters with shorter queues

premium.title: Premium Priority Check-in
premium.description: Personal assistance with check-in process and luggage handling

group.title: Group Priority Check-in
group.description: Streamlined check-in process for groups, ensuring everyone is seated together

how_it_works.title: How Priority Check-in Works
steps: Book your Priority Check-in service online
Arrive at the airport and locate our dedicated check-in counters
Present your booking confirmation to our staff
Enjoy expedited check-in process with minimal waiting
Proceed to security with your boarding pass and checked luggage taken care of

airport_lounge.title: Airport Lounge Access
airport_lounge.subtitle: Relax before your flight
airport_lounge.intro: Enjoy exclusive access to premium airport lounges where you can relax, refresh, and recharge before your flight in a comfortable environment away from the busy terminal.

standard.title: Standard Lounge Access
standard.description: Access to comfortable seating, complimentary refreshments, and Wi-Fi

premium.title: Premium Lounge Access
premium.description: Enhanced lounge experience with premium food and beverages, shower facilities, and business services

vip.title: VIP Lounge Access
vip.description: Exclusive access to VIP lounges with personalized service, gourmet dining, and luxury amenities
